questions.quote: Ah, baking soda. Annoying little product. 'I can do this. I can do that.' Why doesn't this stuff just shut up?
(Tilts her head down, looking over her glasses in amazement of
This dog in the courtyard across from my bedroom window that never never stops barking..
Hey, I just found twenty dollars! I tell you this, something is happening in my life. I did this opposite thing last night. Up was down, black was white, good was -
Alright, hang on. Let me call Kramer and see if you can hear anything, hold on. >click click click<...
'Literally'? What's THAT supposed to mean?  You mind if I hide this somewhere?
Alright, listen, we'll have to do this again some other time, okay? I got a lotta work to do.
Regardless. I had to walk around for the rest of the party in some cheap Metlife windbreaker. Now, it is payback time.
Yes, we were waiting for our mail to arrive and I happened to mention to her how you felt that it was never going "to happen" for you.
Sure, and you were always in Korea with your religious chachkis.
